```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(patchwork)
library(kableExtra)

df <- data.frame("file" = c(
    "c8_inter1.0_common1.0_xd0.0_v0.1_dim3_prec0.01alph1.0bet0.1.csv",
    "c8_inter2.0_common1.0_xd0.0_v0.1_dim3_prec0.01alph1.0bet0.1.csv"
)) %>%
    # map read these csvs into nested dataframe
    mutate(data = map(file, read_csv, )) %>%
    # unnest them
    unnest(data)
# group by file


temp <- df %>%
    reframe(
        # type 2 error
        mixT2 = mean(zeroInDPM, na.rm = T),
        kT2 = mean(zeroInk, na.rm = T),
        slrT2 = mean(zeroInSLR, na.rm = T),

        # coverage
        mixCov = mean(commonInDPM, na.rm = T),
        kCov = mean(commonInk, na.rm = T),
        slrCov = mean(commonInSLR, na.rm = T),

        # bias
        biasMix = mean(common - meanBeta1, na.rm = T),
        biasK = mean(common - meanBetakclust1, na.rm = T),
        biasSLR = mean(common - meanBetaSLR, na.rm = T),

        # MSE
        mseMix = sqrt(mean((common - meanBeta1)^2, na.rm = T)),
        mseK = sqrt(mean((common - meanBetakclust1)^2, na.rm = T)),
        mseSLR = sqrt(mean((common - meanBetaSLR)^2, na.rm = T)),
        .by = c(common, interEffect)
    )
```


# Common Effect

```{r}
df %>%
    pivot_longer(c(
        meanBeta1, meanBetakclust1, meanBetaSLR
    )) %>%
    select(name, value, common, interEffect) %>%
    drop_na() %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = value, fill = name)) +
    geom_density(alpha = 0.2) +
    facet_grid(
        cols = vars(interEffect), scales = "free",
        labeller = labeller(.rows = label_both, .cols = label_both)
    )
```

## MSE
```{r}
temp %>%
    select(common, interEffect, starts_with("mse")) %>%
    kable() %>%
    kable_paper()
```

## bias
```{r}
temp %>%
    select(common, interEffect, starts_with("bias")) %>%
    kable() %>%
    kable_paper()
```


## T2 error
```{r}
temp %>%
    select(common, interEffect, contains("T2")) %>%
    kable() %>%
    kable_paper()
```

## Cov
```{r}
temp %>%
    select(common, interEffect, contains("Cov")) %>%
    kable() %>%
    kable_paper()
```
